origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'BankComparison.get_credit_loan_rates', 'description': 'Get the credit loan rates comparison between a specific bank and other major banks.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'bank_name', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the bank to compare'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'rates_comparison', 'description': 'the comparison of credit loan rates'}]}, {'name': 'MarketResearch.get_market_share', 'description': 'Get the market share of a specific bank in the credit loan market.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'bank_name', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the bank'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'market_share', 'description': 'the market share of the bank'}]}, {'name': 'ProductInnovation.get_innovation_status', 'description': 'Get the innovation status of credit loan products of a specific bank.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'bank_name', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the bank'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'innovation_status', 'description': 'the innovation status of the bank's credit loan products'}]}, {'name': 'CompetitiveStrategy.get_competitive_suggestions', 'description': 'Get suggestions to enhance the market competitiveness of a specific bank in the credit loan market.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'bank_name', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the bank'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'competitive_suggestions', 'description': 'suggestions to enhance market competitiveness'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我是一名金融分析师，想了解某银行的信用贷款市场竞争力。首先，请获取该银行与其他主要银行的信用贷款利率对比。然后，获取该银行的信用贷款市场份额。接下来，获取该银行的信用贷款产品创新情况。最后，请提供一些提升市场竞争力的建议。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取某银行与其他主要银行的信用贷款利率对比
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'bank_name'的值是什么?
{'rates_comparison': '某银行信用贷款利率为4.5%，对比其他主要银行如ABC银行为4.2%，XYZ银行为4.7%。'}

请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
